All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddItemActivity
Activity for adding a new item to the inventory.
AddItemActivityTest
 
AnimationUtils
 
BarcodeFetchInfo
Fetches product details from the UPCItemDB API
BarcodeFetchInfo.OnProductFetchedListener
Listener for when the product details are fetched
DatePickerEditText
Custom EditText for date input, which displays a DatePickerDialog when touched.
EditItemActivity
Activity for editing the details of an item in an Android application.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterDialogFragment
DialogFragment for selecting a filter to apply to the list of items.
FilterDialogFragment.FilterDialogListener
Interface for the callback to be invoked when a filter is selected.
FilterDialogFragment.FilterType
Enum representing the different types of filters that can be applied.
FirestoreRepository
Repository class for interacting with the Firestore database.
FirestoreRepository.OnImageUriDeletedListener
 
FirestoreRepository.OnItemAddedListener
Callback interface for item addition results.
FirestoreRepository.OnItemDeletedListener
Callback interface for item deletion results.
FirestoreRepository.OnItemFetchedListener
 
FirestoreRepository.OnItemsFetchedListener
Callback interface for item fetching results.
FirestoreRepository.OnItemUpdatedListener
Callback interface for item update results.
FirestoreRepository.OnTagAddedListener
Callback interface for tag addition results.
FirestoreRepository.OnTagsFetchedListener
Callback interface for tag fetching results.
FirestoreRepository.OnUserAddedListener
Callback interface for user addition results.
FirestoreRepository.OnUserExistenceCheckedListener
Callback interface for tag addition results.
Formatters
Utility class providing commonly used formatters for numeric and date formatting.
ImageAdapter
Adapter for the RecyclerView in the AddItemActivity.
ImageAdapter.OnImageDeleteListener
Interface for the callback to be invoked when an image is deleted.
Item
Represents an item with detailed information.
ItemAdapter
Adapter for the GridView in the MainActivity.
ItemComparator
A comparator for sorting instances of Item based on various fields.
ItemFilter
Filter for the GridView in the MainActivity.
ItemTest
 
LoginActivity
LoginActivity is responsible for handling the user login process.
LoginPageTest
 
MainActivity
The main activity class that serves as the entry point for the application.
MainActivityTestUI
 
PhotoStorageManager
 
SortDialogFragment
A dialog fragment that provides options for sorting items.
SortDialogFragment.SortOptionListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a sorting option is selected.
TagDialogHelper
 
TagDialogHelper.OnTagsSelectedListener

Activity for viewing the details of an item in an Android application.
ViewDetailsUITest
 
ViewPhotoActivity
Activity for viewing photos associated with an item.
ViewProfileActivity
Activity for viewing the user's profile.
ViewProfileActivity.ItemFilter
A custom Filter for filtering items in an ItemAdapter.
ViewProfileUITest
